description:
Andrew Graham of Neo Canada is facing off against Argo. Argo goes into Hyper Mode and uses a new technique, the Gaia Crusher, to create mountains in the ring.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Domon Tai Argo! Totsugeki Bolt Gundam
Domon contre Argo ! La charge du Bolt Gundam
Domon gegen Argo! Vorpreschender Bolt Gundam
Domon vs. Argo! Charging Bolt Gundam
ドモン対アルゴ! 突撃ボルトガンダム
